
Changes
=======

1.1.4 (svn)
-----------

  * fix numeric slice default page
    (rnix, 2010-06-16)

1.1.3
-----

  * make alpha batch non-ascii aware
    (rnix, 2010-06-15)

1.1.2
-----

  * make value of request param unicode aware in batch.py
    (rnix, 2010-04-13)

1.1.1
-----
  
  * Write url query data to self.request.form instead of self.request in KSS
    view
    (rnix, 2009-03-25)
